item.title: A Game of Plot Hooks [Rough Draft]
item.description: Previous Recap # The crew is taking a long rest in town after completing their Document Retreaval quest. Current Day # Discussion about Anders # His mother was murdered (Medra) No one knows how it happened. She was stabbed and possibly poison knife In the neck. Very wealthy fleet of fishing. Ander’s dad was sick and died (10years ago) Rumors # Gelen Primewater Might be working with the Sea Princes on the side.
